headline: UnitedHealth gains, Fox announces secondary offering
summary: Yahoo Finance host Josh Lipton tracks today's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute, including UnitedHealth (UNH) shares rising and Fox (FOX, FOXA) announcing the pricing of a secondary offering. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: Why FOX (FOXA) Shares Are Plunging Today
summary: Shares of cable news and media network Fox (NASDAQ:FOXA) fell 5.4% in the morning session after the company announced the pricing of a large secondary offering of its Class B common stock tied to a resolution within the Murdoch Family Trust. The offering consists of nearly 16.9 million shares sold by trusts for Prudence MacLeod, Elisabeth Murdoch, and James Murdoch, who will no longer be beneficiaries of any trust holding FOX shares. This move is part of a settlement of legal proceedings within

headline: FOX CORPORATION ANNOUNCES PRICING OF SECONDARY OFFERING OF CLASS B COMMON STOCK
summary: Fox Corporation ("FOX" or the "Company") (Nasdaq: FOXA, FOX) today announced the pricing of the previously announced underwritten public offering (the "Offering") by trusts established for the benefit of Prudence MacLeod, Elisabeth Murdoch and James Murdoch and his or her respective descendants and charitable organizations (the "Selling Stockholders") of 16,835,016 shares of FOX's Class B common stock, par value $0.01 per share (the "Class B common stock"), at a price to the public of $54.25 per
